title: Leaver
body:
I hav a 5 matchmade leaver for 20mins

is it ok if i cancel it or....do i have to suffer

replies.body: You'll have to work through the Leaverbuster to get back into game! Did your client run into some malfunctions that would cause you to leave the game? {{sticker:galio-happy}}
You'll have to wait 20 minutes for each Leaverbuster. Make sure to accept the match or your Leaverbuster will reset.
